attributes.action: Make it easier for people with disabilities to get a job
attributes.additional_details: I myself suffer from disabilities including some learning disabilities. I didn't get the help I needed in school so my grades are really low. I also suffer from scoliosis,neurofibromatosis, and learning disabilities. I do also suffer asthma and IBS. I am a hard worker and went back to college giving it everything I have got. I passes a Business and IT Level 1 course along with functional skills maths and English and yet I'm still being asked for grade C results regardless of my problems!!!
attributes.background: People with disabilities have a bigger struggle getting a job including myself, especially when a "C" grade is needed in maths and English. People with learning difficulties or who come from a special needs school won't have this. We need more acceptance towards people with disabilities and trust us

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to help people with disabilities to find a job.
